TopicTitle: reply vs update - solved (it was a silly question)

Articles.Content:
Been a while since I started a mission report on the forum. Just posted a thread and wanted to put the first chapter as a separate post to the original, but it keeps updating the original. Googled for a bit and fell short of talent so can someone fill me in on how to make the first chapter a reply to my original post rather than an update.

Many thanks

SM

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-18T09:52:21Z" title="05/18/2015 09:52  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 18, 2015</time> by Speeding Mullet**
Just wait a while before posting. I don't remember the time but it's not that long. 15 minutes or something?

> 
> 15 minutes or something?

Yup that's my impatience showing up quite badly right there ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
